text: Went to get my son’s glasses and was served by Julia. She was very professional and handled my 5 year old son very well. Highly recommended!

Highly recommended as their staff is so friendly and professional. Thank you to yi liang who attended to us. He is so professional in answering all my queries and recommended the suitable glasses for my daughter. And also thank you to the  friendly pretty lady who helps to adjust the specs for my daughter.

New customer. Went to get new contacts at 9pm, understanding that they close at 9.30. Eye tests shouldn’t take long but the lady who served me did not seem to want to help me with this even though I requested for the eye test and asked if the specific contact lens brand I asked for would fit my eyes. I needed the lenses in a rush so I had no choice but to purchase it. Was a little disappointed. Just a warning to those who are looking to buy contacts, come at a good time so they can serve you properly. Felt like they were just trying to make a quick buck so they can close their store quickly and didn’t provide the full service they should. Nevertheless they still advised that I could come back if it’s not suitable and they would offer other options so I appreciate that. Hope the lens fit well.

Welcomed by friendly staff. It was a busy time but the staff gave assurance that we will be attended soon. Helpful service rendered by Vector and he had good product knowledge. He even helped to adjust my son current spec. Really appreciate his help. Thank you so much for the service. Highly recommended and 2 thumbs up !

Had issues with contact lens and Julia helped and taught me how to put on and remove it. She was extremely patient and thoughtful and even helped me to check the issue with my eyes and the lens. Thanks so much Julia for being so patient and kind!!!
